output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF Presence: - Yes, contains "CMF: 31240006" which is a clear indicator of electoral propaganda material
2. Candidate Reference: - Directly refers to "George Simion" as presidential candidate - Uses hashtag #GeorgeSimionPreședinte - Explicitly promotes him for president with "George Simion Președinte!"
3. Wide Population Targeting: - Paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Large estimated audience (500,001-1,000,000) - High impressions (10,000-14,999) - Multiple platform distribution
4. Electoral Objective: - Clear electoral messaging with "Președinte" - Uses campaign-specific hashtags (#Algeri2024) - Direct call for presidency - Romanian flag emojis for patriotic appeal
5. Journalistic Value: - No journalistic content - Pure promotional material
6. Personal Opinion: - Not a personal opinion piece - Structured as campaign material

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Uses campaign slogans and hashtags - Is a paid advertisement reaching large audiences - Has clear electoral objective - No journalistic or informative value
conclusion.message-for-police: SC VIDEO DANCRYS-STUDIO SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propaganda electorala dupa incheierea campaniei electorale pentru alegerile prezidentiale. Postarea cu ID-ul 1136207171352012 promoveaza explicit candidatul George Simion pentru functia de presedinte, folosind sloganul "George Simion Președinte!" insotit de simboluri nationale si hashtag-uri electorale (#GeorgeSimionPreședinte, #Algeri2024). Materialul este marcat cu cod CMF 31240006, confirmand natura sa de propaganda electorala, si a fost distribuit ca reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, avand un impact semnificativ cu o audienta estimata intre 500.001 si 1.000.000 de persoane, fiind astfel o incercare clara de a influenta votul in perioada in care propaganda electorala este interzisa prin lege.
